text: The research findings indicate that implementing artificial empathy strategies in human-AI interactions can significantly improve the quality of interactions and customer experiences. Technologies such as natural language processing, emotion recognition, and sentiment analysis enable AI to respond more accurately and sensitively to user needs and emotions. The use of artificial empathy strategies in human-AI interactions has become a focal point in the development of more responsive and humane technology. This research explores the optimization of human-AI interactions through the application of artificial empathy strategies to enhance affective and social customer experiences. Using a qualitative research approach, the study reviews a range of studies and literature relevant to the topic, drawing insights from journals, articles, and books.
